history.post: Dear Episcopalian By the way, Hoare was not the first to suggest the Shroud of Turin was a garment. Timossi made this suggestion in 1941 that it appeared to be intended as a bed sheet. John Tyrer suggested it has the necessary consistency for the practical considerations as a garment in 1981. You can read my book on the subject of the Shroud of Turin being a Jewish tallit: The Ancient Jewish Shroud At Turin (Regina Caeli Press, 2010) ISBN : 978 0 9826739 0 4 $27.99 + $4.50 shipping & handling http://www.reginacaelipress.com.
